decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This development must be completed before 30 May 2019.
You must notify the Council that you have completed the work no later than 21 days after doing so, giving the name of the developer, the address of the property where the extension is and the date of completion.
The materials used on the external surfaces of the development shall match those used in the building to which it is attached in terms of style, colour, texture and, in the case of brickwork, bonding, coursing and pointing.
All openable parts of any side windows in the extension shall be more than 1.7 metres above finished floor level and permanently retained as such.
Any side windows shall be in obscure glazing and permanently retained as such.  Once built, no further side windows shall be installed.
The proposed development shall not be implemented in conjunction with or after the implementation of the extension referred to in decision 00045/68/P1 for erection of a single storey side and rear extension to the house.
description: Ground floor rear extension 6m deep, 2.396m high to the eaves with the maximum height of 3.519m.
